basics.name: Larry Villegas Costas
basics.label: Remote Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: Technology enthusiast and certified Full Stack developer taking pleasure in assisting organizations in crafting innovative solutions for optimizing business processes. Brings a wealth of experience from various software development roles, spanning front-end technologies like JavaScript, React, Redux, and Tailwind, as well as back-end technologies such as Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL. Background includes extensive experience in agile communication and teamwork, along with success in managing and leading teams of over 10 individuals.

work.name: Self-Employed
work.summary: Working independently on personal projects, I successfully graduated as a Full Stack Developer.
features: Pair programming with 40+ developers from different parts of the world.
highlights: Graduated as a Full Stack Web Developer

work.name: Ministerio de Defensa del Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia
work.summary: I began my career as a computer technician, and through my dedication and hard work, I was promoted to head of development. Later, I advanced to the position of Head of Unit, where I successfully contributed for five years.
features: Led a team for 7 years, resolving administrative challenges and overseeing salary management for over 15,000 individuals.
Modernized the process of issuing military and pre-military service certificates in the Plurinational State of Bolivia. Reduced processing time from one month to a few hours.
Implemented robust security measures comparable to those used for paper bills or currency.
Technologies used: Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft ASPX with Visual C#, IBM Informix 4GL.
Recognized for leading this project, and even receiving a promotion.
Military and Pre-Military Service Certificates in the Defense Ministry Plurinational State of Bolivia.
highlights: Recognized for leading this project, and even receiving a promotion
Graduated as a Full Stack Web Developer

education.area: Remote Full Stack Web Development Program, Full-Time
courses: Ruby on Rails - Web Application Framework

projects.name: Fast Land Racers
projects.description: Fast-Lane-Racer is a car booking website that enables users to effortlessly book rides and travel to their desired destinations. Users can reserve a car from the available options by providing the date and city, ensuring a seamless and reliable car booking experience.
highlights: Developed a full-stack web application using Ruby on Rails and React & Redux.

projects.name: Tesla Clone
projects.description: Tesla Clone is a replica of the Tesla website. It is a static website built using Astro, Tailwind..
highlights: Developed a static website using Astro, Tailwind, and Netlify.

projects.name: Pennywise
projects.description: Pennywise: Simplify your finances. Track expenses, set budgets, gain insights, and make informed decisions for financial freedom. Get started today!
highlights: Developed a full-stack web application using Ruby on Rails and React & Redux.

projects.name: Crypto Coinranking
projects.description: It's a powerful web application designed specifically for cryptocurrencies. Leveraging the capabilities of React and Redux, it offers comprehensive information about various digital coins.
highlights: Developed web application using React & Redux.

projects.name: The Simpsons Fans Club
projects.description: This project showcases my proficiency in JavaScript, Webpack, and Jest, along with my skills in working with JSON for reading and writing APIs.
highlights: Developed a static website using JavaScript, Webpack, and Jest.

projects.name: Catholic Music Concert
projects.description: A landing page specifically created to promote a Catholic concert. The design is intuitive and user-friendly, enabling visitors to access essential concert details such as date, time, venue, and artists quickly and easily.
highlights: Developed a static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
